content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-9.5, 24.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at position (not specified, but connected to the offshore pump)
- Steam engine at position (not specified, but connected to the boiler)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace at position (0, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace at position (5, 5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (not specified) and inserter that puts into assembling machine (position not specified)
- Beltgroup (position not specified) that connects the furnace at position (not specified) to assembling machine at position (not specified)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to electricity connections
- Ensure that all entities requiring power are properly connected to the electric network. Check for obstructions that may prevent connections.

### Errors when using undefined entities
- Make sure that all entities are properly defined before use. If an entity is not recognized, check for typos or ensure that the necessary modules or libraries are imported correctly.

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that there are no obstructions or placement blockages when attempting to connect pipes. Check the surrounding area for other entities that may interfere with the connection.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Verify that the target tile is free from obstructions.
